title: 2012/406/EU: Council Decision of 16 July 2012 appointing a Spanish member and a Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
19.7.2012 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 189/10
COUNCIL DECISION
of 16 July 2012
appointing a Spanish member and a Spanish alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2012/406/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 305 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Spanish Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 22 December 2009 and on 18 January 2010, the Council adopted Decisions 2009/1014/EU (1) and 2010/29/EU (2) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2010 to 25 January 2015.
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Francisco ÁLVAREZ-CASCOS FERNÁNDEZ. An alternate member’s seat has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr José PORTILLA GONZALEZ,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2015:
(a) as member:
— Mr Javier FERNÁNDEZ FERNÁNDEZ, Presidente del Principado de Asturias;
(b) as alternate member:
— Mr Guillermo MARTÍNEZ SUÁREZ, Consejero de la Presidencia del Principado de Asturias.
This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 July 2012.
For the Council
The President
S. ALETRARIS
(1)  OJ L 348, 29.12.2009, p. 22.
(2)  OJ L 12, 19.1.2010, p. 11.
